review:
I recently finished my three-year orthodontic treatment with Dr. Chethan S. and I'm so grateful for the incredible transformation! I initially had crooked teeth and an underbite, and Dr. Chethan S. thoroughly explained the treatment plan along with alternative options like clear aligners.

My teeth are now straight and perfectly aligned now and I have a confident smile.
He patiently listened to my concerns from the very beginning and answered all my questions in detail.

Throughout the treatment, Dr. Chethan S. displayed immense patience and a friendly demeanor. The clinic staff were also very welcoming and helpful. Even with occasional discomfort during adjustments, Dr. Chethan S. always offered solutions to minimize any pain

If you're looking for an orthodontist in Bangalore, Dr. Chethan S is the perfect choice. He's a true professional with a wealth of experience and a genuine dedication to helping his patients achieve their dream smiles.

Doctor listens the problems very patiently and explain the cause, medications and other important aspect of the problem. He gives extreme caution to hygiene and cleanliness. He is highly recommended for any dental issues.
excellent experience.  very hygienic and extra cautious for cleanliness. great treatment and diagnosis.
The doctor was very sweet and explains things well in the best way you can understand. Clinic also follows covid-19 related measures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
